FinTech startups are innovating across broad categories — in core banking, new financial services, insurance, and investing. What’s driving this change? And how do these startups successfully attack and compete with the big incumbent entities? In this talk, Andreessen Horowitz’s General Partner Alex Rampell considers all the types of innovation in financial services, and how the market is expanding.

The Future of Money: Banking on FinTech - Alex Rampell, General Partner at Andreessen Horowitz
